name: Guess I need to make a new one.
author: Rienion

posts.author: Rienion
posts.content: After reading the guides set by Maxx. I decided what I wanted to do is not a cleric surprisingly enough, but I wanted to do a necromancer type character. However, going through it in single player I don't really know how to do that (since I remembered now palemaster requires special permissions don't know if I could get that or not). From what it looks like I needed to buff conjuration but I could be wrong.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Wonderful idea a bone warrior it is Rienion but hear my advice and do not attemt that on a 30 Level restricted server like Arelith, it will cripple you more than benefit you in the end. You can make anti-heroes just fine with other builds like (Bard 20/ BG 4/ FTR 6) for example and they will be much better.

posts.author: Rienion
posts.content: Personally, it's mainly down to RP alongside not knowing where else to play. Nobody ever really does the evil guy, so I wanted to do something new. But, I was conflicted on Arelith magic unless it instant kills, is pretty useless at times. But, doing something similar to like a Death Knight would be cliche wouldn't it? I'm not really good with undead things xD

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Huh, who cares about the spells (you will have them too), it's the perma-song/ Curse song that will blow things-up and make you a threat to behold. We are talking about massive bonusses/anti-buffs here along with other goodies like epic specialization from Fighter, you will be a best. We might even be able to get some of those Divine feats (might/shield) on top of those. This type of anti-hero is simply good till he starts to buff, then he becomes monstrous! It might be a bit more tricky to play him in his full potencial though, i don't know your abilities. And then, there is the other type that gets Bard only for a few strong points like (UMD, full Tumble, Taunt, fulll Spellcraft) and goes for more Blackguard/ Fighter Levels. That one anti-hero has much higher starting stats but lower end-potencial than the first, but he is also easier to play. Both builds are good. Select one and let me know.

posts.author: Rienion
posts.content: Well I can do without spells I suppose scrolls are just as good (I was only mainly concerned with healing cause you know that greater restoration spell is the best xD) I guess give me the one that's hard to use, and has great potential. No sense in taking the easy route >:D If I'm gonna do something might as well do it at the hardest possible for me xD. But, I'm a little concerned Bard song can easily be dispelled right?

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
The Bard's Song is Undispellable by any means. The Bard's Curse Song effects can be countered with Restoration. In this case DO IT AGAIN "Evil Laughter"...

You will have about 20 Uses per Day for your Bard Song/ Curse Song and each one will last for 100 Rounds.

posts.author: Rienion
posts.content: That sounds like a gigantic long time xD ^^

posts.content: The pain... the pain... wonder what will pop in next. Will it be another bard's are awesome summary, or something more :o The excitement x.x and the deadly wait before I go onto the servers :3

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I made the build customized to your needs Rienion, that means it has slightly more Ranger levels than if i went for absolute power, because i wanted to have some Ranger spells in there as well. It has all the LongBow feats you will ever need and Weapon Finesse, so you can change to a set of Short-Swords and start dual-wielding if you want to. He can set deadly traps, make a friend of almost any beast out there with his animal empathy, can self-buff himself with ultravision, cat's grace, blade thirst and his animal companion with greater magic fang and cat's grace. He has very good spot and elvensight for spotting hidden foes and even a low level but useful Bard song to aid him in battle. I believe he can also use any items in Arelith, and has good AC and good saves. Attack bonus and Damage are typical of an Arcane Archer, which means they are high. Use elemental arrows for your longbow whenever you can to further increase your damage.

Good luck,
